fxInfo_clarification: If the Head of Government is selected by the legislature alone, please select ”Elected by Elite Group.” If there is more than one body who is involved in the selection process for the Head of Government and one of them happens to be the legislature, please select ”Appointed.”
fxInfo_ordering: Asked only if EXECNUM is answered 3, or if HOSHOG is answered 2.
fxInfo_question: How is the Head of Government selected?

fxInfo_responses.value: Other, please specify in the comments section

name: e_ccp_hogelect
